data.text: @Texas_Hillbilly @RyanSeacrest @AmericanIdol @TheEllenShow I guess I’m just not big enough or just people are to busy.  I’m going to keep trying until the end.  God helped me live.  She’s not I just want one wish for her. With @Twitter  @jack and all Someone should be able to hear. I’m so sad   Please please @AmericanIdol @RyanSeacrest
